name: Vancouver Premium Packaging
address: Vancouver Premium Packaging, 8980 Fraserwood Ct unit 9, Burnaby, BC V5J 5H7

featured_reviews.review_id: Great service and great delivery of designs!  John was fantastic and him and his team didn't stop working until they made us happy!  We have gotten so many compliments on the box and packaging of our RYERCAT cat toothbrushes and we couldn't be more happy with the end results.  We are definitely going to continue using Vancouver Premium Packaging for more of our future projects :). Definitely recommend them!

We have gotten so many compliments on the box and packaging of our RYERCAT cat toothbrushes and we couldn't be more happy with the end results.  We are definitely going to continue using Vancouver Premium Packaging for more of our future projects :). Definitely recommend them!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Melanie! It's amazing to see how well your brand RYERCAT is doing! We look forward to working on your future products!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I used VPP for a custom triangular-shaped jewellery box. They are a great company to work with and helped bring my vision of the box beautifully to life from conception to delivery. The team at VPP displayed attention to detail and ensured that every aspect of the box met my expectations. The price was very fair and competitive as well.

Their communication throughout the process was great. They kept me updated on the progress and promptly responded to any questions or concerns I had.

I was also impressed by the quality of the materials used. The boxes not only look amazing but also feel sturdy and well-constructed.

Overall, my experience with Vancouver Premium Packaging was excellent, and I highly recommend them for any custom packaging needs. Their expertise, attention to detail, and great customer service make them a standout choice.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for the amazing review Mayumi. It was such an adventure working on the unique packaging carton we made for your alchemical jewelry & accessories products. The custom triangular shaped rigid box with the custom two layer insert was a unique solution created for your specific products. 

We hope everyone has a chance to check out your products at https://emblemoriginals.com

featured_reviews.review_id: John and his team worked with me to refine the look and feel of my brand, suggest the best packaging solutions and design labels for maximum impact. I couldn't be happier. They were responsive and really wonderful to work with. I wanted packaging for my small biz that was clean and professional from Day One, and they delivered. Highly recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text: John and his team worked with me to refine the look and feel of my brand, suggest the best packaging solutions and design labels for maximum impact. I couldn't be happier. They were responsive and really wonderful to work with. I wanted packaging for my small biz that was clean and professional from Day One, and they delivered. Highly recommend!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind review Joanne! It was a pleasure for our team to work on your custom designed spout bags, labels and jar packaging for Sugar Sugar Scrub Co! We look forward to seeing your business grow and appreciate the opportunity to work with you!

featured_reviews.review_id: We've worked with this company a few times now and gotten an array of custom items made for our business. We've gotten custom boxes, pouches, bottles, sleeves... It's great to have one company that is able to do so many different products. They organize everything, from the designing, to manufacturing and then the shipping. It's wonderful to not have to worry about the small details of getting a custom product made.
featured_reviews.review_text: We've worked with this company a few times now and gotten an array of custom items made for our business. We've gotten custom boxes, pouches, bottles, sleeves... featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you so much for the great review Alysia! We have always enjoyed working on your custom packaging projects and look forward to the next one! We hope that the work we have done for your business has helped it grow!

Everyone stopping in Vernon, BC should definitely check out your store Teassential! or visit online at www.teassential.ca

featured_reviews.review_id: The packaging they've created for me is spectacular! I'm always blown away with every project. They exceed my expectations. They suggest possibilities I never would've thought of otherwise. I'm a very happy client.
